update.description:
The ign-gazebo bionic builds haven't been running GPU tests because they can't find the a DRI display: 

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/ign-blueprint/job/ignition_gazebo-ci-ign-gazebo2-bionic-amd64/6/consoleFull

~~~
-- Looking for display capabilities
-- Could not find 'xwininfo', which is needed for FindDRI. Please install the package 'x11-utils'
-- Skipping these INTEGRATION tests because a valid display was not found:
--  depth_camera.cc
--  gpu_lidar.cc
--  sensors_system.cc
~~~

This adds `x11-utils` to `BASE_DEPENDENCIES` to make sure they are installed.

Test build with 4 new tests that ran:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_gazebo-ci-ign-gazebo2-bionic-amd64&build=7)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/ign-blueprint/job/ignition_gazebo-ci-ign-gazebo2-bionic-amd64/7/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/ign-blueprint/job/ignition_gazebo-ci-ign-gazebo2-bionic-amd64/7/testReport/(root)/

~~~
-- Looking for display capabilities
--  + found a display available ($DISPLAY is set)
--  + found a valid dri display (glxinfo)
~~~
update.title: Add x11-utils to BASE_DEPENDENCIES since it's needed to check for dri

content.raw:
I added a check to make the build unstable if missing GPU support is found. 

Tested here, [reported correctly](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/1783/parsed_console/):

![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64&build=1783)
[https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition\_gazebo-ci-pr\_any-ubuntu\_auto-amd64/1783/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/1783/))
content.html:
I added a check to make the build unstable if missing GPU support is found.

Tested here, reported correctly:

https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/1783/)

pull_request.title: Add x11-utils to BASE_DEPENDENCIES since it's needed to check for dri
